name: Gauntlets of Strength
description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
3 main attack damage to strength heroes
1.35 main attack damage to universal heroes
trivia: This item is based on the Gauntlets of Ogre Strength from Warcraft 3

recentChanges.description: Now builds into Soul Ring. Reduced gold cost from 150 to 135
